data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Azteca have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 3, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
America's Sebastian Cordova gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cruz Azul defender.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Paul Aguilar is back on the pitch.
In the minute 7, Paul Aguilar is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Jorge Perez signals a America throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
In the minute 9, Giovani Dos Santos for America gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jorge Perez awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Cruz Azul drives forward and Adrian Aldrete gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 13, America pushes forward through Sebastian Cordova, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to America.
Paul Aguilar of America is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 16, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Cruz Azul are pushing forward but Luis Romo's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 20, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sebastian Cordova for America drives towards goal at Estadio Azteca. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Free kick America.
In the minute 25, At Estadio Azteca, Igor Lichnovsky has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for America in Mexico City.
Cruz Azul needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 27, Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cruz Azul's half?
Luis Romo (Cruz Azul) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 29, Free kick for America in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Nicolas Benedetti for America has been booked by Jorge Perez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 33, Cruz Azul are in shooting range from this free kick.
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 37, Luis Romo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cruz Azul.
Attention is being given to Americaâ€™s Sebastian Caceres and play has been suspended briefly.
Ramon Juarez (America) has replaced the possibly injured Sebastian Caceres at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 40, Sebastian Cordova for the away team is judged to be offside.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In Mexico City Cruz Azul drive forward through Juan Escobar. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 43, Jorge Perez blows against Cruz Azul's Adrian Aldrete for offside.
America will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul's Luis Romo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Azteca. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Jorge Perez will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 48, Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
America have a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 51, Emanuel Aguilera (America) has received a yellow card from Jorge Perez.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Mexico City to check on Emanuel Aguilera, who is grimacing with pain.
It seems as if Emanuel Aguilera is unable to continue. Santiago Caseres replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 54, Jorge Perez awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In Mexico City Cruz Azul attack through Adrian Aldrete. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 57, Free kick for America in the half of Cruz Azul.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cruz Azul's Elias Hernandez breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
America have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Cruz Azul make their first substitution with Yoshimar Yotun replacing Elias Hernandez.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a throw-in for Cruz Azul, close to America's area.
Miguel Herrera (America) is making a third substitution, with Federico Vinas replacing Giovani Dos Santos.
In the minute 71, The away team replace Sebastian Cordova with Andres Ibarguen.
The away team have replaced Nicolas Benedetti with Leonardo Suarez. This is the fifth substitution made today by Miguel Herrera.
Roberto Alvarado is replacing Santiago Gimenez for the home team.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 75, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Free kick for America in the half of Cruz Azul.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Throw-in America.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for America in their own half.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 83, Throw-in America.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Robert Siboldi is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Azteca with Misael Dominguez replacing Orbelin Pineda.
In Mexico City Cruz Azul drive forward through Juan Escobar. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 89, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
America have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
America to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
Jorge Perez awards America a goal kick.
That's full-time at Estadio Azteca. The final score is 0-0.
